title: When A Team mate Says They're "Stoned"
body:
http://i.imgur.com/6qz9M.gif

(This is me trying to avoid using a cursing gif :P)

replies.body: There is a 95% chance they aren't stoned, but instead a 12 year old boy trying to sound cool. From experience, stoned/drunk players don't actually announce it.
i do when im real fucked up but by that time people probably already know since i typo every other word
Lol, "I'm not as think as you drunk I am".

I swear to Drunk I'm not God!
er...
Stay in drugs and don't do school kids!
er...
this is gonna be a doozy...
pretty much, and the adults who do are hilariously sad
Adults that drink? I like to play drunk with my friends if they are over sometimes :( (no, not ranked).
I think he means adults who announce
Announcing it in anything other than ARAMs is retarded. Drunken ARAMs are fun as hell though.
have you tried the league drinking game when playing? I just came up with an ARAM version.
I announce it when I make a mistake... sometimes even when I am not drunk or stoned.

I'm almost always stoned when I play (or do anything ever) but why would anyone else in game give a shit?

Besides, playing stoned isn't much of a big deal if you're used to being stoned. Odds are someone who used stoned as an excuse would be shit when sober too.
They'd better be playing malphite

{{champion:3}} Duuude.
{{champion:54}} Yeeaah?
{{champion:3}} Like, like... you knooow?
{{champion:54}} Yeaaah duuude.
{{champion:72}} _inhales_
I just report them for assisting enemy team when they play like shit.

So far every game I've had where a player says "HEY GUYS I'M HIGH" or "HEY GUYS I'M DRUNK", they end up getting the worst score on their team, and sometimes the whole game.

Announcing you are under the influence (of whatever) does not give you a pass to feed and build mana on Tryndamere. It also doesn't make mature individuals (note: not all mature individuals are adults; there are immature adults and mature teens; proud to say I'm a mature-ish adult) think that you are cool, awesome, funny, respectable, or someone they would want to game with in the future.

For these people, I have but one request.


http://i.imgur.com/A72QOBn.gif
I would be more worried for a stoner to announce "I am sooooo sober man".
idk i play stoned, i play sober, i play all the same pretty much, but you dont need to go announcing it to everyone... Like what happens between you and your bong, should stay between your bong. lol
Playing stoned is the only way to play.  Seriously, who the hell plays this sober?
"Dude i just smoked like 4 plates don't be angry when i play badly"

The one time I played stoned I died 1v2 top as riven because their teemo jungle was Invis in lane waiting for level 3 to Gangbang me. I couldn't help but laugh. I ended up laughing for 20-25 minutes without realizing it. I was afk the entire time on the floor. Team surrendered cus 4v5 but by golly, that was the best laugh I ever had

Most of the stoners I played with actually did a good job in the team. 

Believe it or not but some pot smokers play better whey they are high
From experience, stoned players announce it to their friends only.
